original_title: Huwag Mong Salingin ang Sugat Ko
overview: Delfin is a doctor who returns to his hometown in the hopes of giving medical assistance to the people of Buena Vista who are suffering from leprosy. He also returns to find out the real reason why his father was killed. The longer he stays, the more he realizes that leprosy is not the town's incurable disease but the hatred that lies in the heart of its people.
title: Huwag Mong Salingin ang Sugat Ko
